workflow.description:
This workflow definition defines the steps involved in scheduling a recording, capturing it, and
    ingesting it, after which processing operations may be added.

operation.description: Scheduled
Capture
Ingest

workflow.title: Scheduled Workflow

workflow.description:
This workflow definition defines the steps involved in scheduling a recording, capturing it, and
    ingesting it, after which processing operations may be added.

operation.description: Scheduled
Capture
Ingest
Apply access control rules from series
Tag source material for archival
Tag dublin core catalogs for publishing
Inspect the media package
Prepare presenter audio and video work versions
Prepare presentation audio and video work versions
Encode presenter (camera) video for videoeditor preview
Extract audio for waveform generation
Generate waveform
Append workflow to hold for trim and transcode
Clean up temporary files
Send email to producer before holding for edit
Review and trim video
Tag smil for archival
Encode presenter (camera) and presentation (slides) video to H.264
Clean up large temporary trimmed file
Encode presenter (camera) to player preview image
Encode presentation (screen) to player preview image
Extract segments from presentation
Encode presenter (camera) to search result preview image
Encode presentation (screen) to search result preview image
Encode presentation (screen) to segment preview image
Retract media package from the engage server
Distribute and publish to engage server
Send email to producer before holding for local test
Test local

workflow.title: Scheduled Workflow

workflow.description:
Based on the Matterhorn default workflow ("full").
    Differences:
    - Encoding profiles for H.264
    - Append another workflow to do the main job in order to implement a "loop"
    - Always stop for trim and always archive
    - Uses error handler workflow that archives the media package

Send email to producer before holding for local test
Test local

Zip delivery media package

Archive media package
Clean up all files

workflow.title: DCE Production Workflow with Splitting - webm preview (presenter/presentation are separate inputs)

workflow.description:
Based on the Matterhorn default workflow ("full").
    Differences:
    - Encoding profiles for H.264
    - Append another workflow to do the main job in order to implement a "loop"
    - Always stop for trim and always archive
    - Uses error handler workflow that archives the media package

workflow.title: Scheduled Workflow

workflow.description:
Based on the Matterhorn default workflow ("full").
    Differences:
    - Encoding profiles for H.264
    - Append another workflow to do the main job in order to implement a "loop"
    - Always stop for trim and always archive
    - Uses error handler workflow that archives the media package
